newsitem.title: KUWAIT: Kuwait air passenger, cargo traffic up in August.
newsitem.headline: Kuwait air passenger, cargo traffic up in August.

text.p: Kuwait International Airport handled six percent more cargo and four percent more passengers in August 1996, compared to the same month last year, the civil aviation authority said on Tuesday.
Air cargo volume was 10,867 tonnes and passengers numbered 427,908 in August 1996, it said in a statement. It did not give comparative figures.
Passenger traffic rose 13.4 percent in the month from July.
The number of flights to and from the airport rose year-on-year four percent to 3,272.
Kuwait Airways Corp, the national carrier, accounted for 60 percent of the flights.
